scripts.build:registry: cd apps/registry && shadcn build -o public/r && cp registry.json public/index.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build:registry && wrangler deploy -c apps/registry/wrangler.jsonc && wrangler deploy -c apps/main/wrangler.jsonc
scripts.deploy:registry: npm run build:registry && wrangler deploy -c apps/registry/wrangler.jsonc
